00032 double prob_of_interaction(double r, FLOAT Vtarget[3], FLOAT Vno[3], int tbegin, int tend)
00033   {
00034     double dT, dloga, dV, dvx, dvy, dvz, prob,h,hubble_a;
00035 
00036     dvx = Vno[0]-Vtarget[0];
00037     dvy = Vno[1]-Vtarget[1];
00038     dvz = Vno[2]-Vtarget[2];
00039     dV = sqrt(dvx*dvx + dvy*dvy + dvz*dvz);
00040 
00041     if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00042       {
00043         dloga = (tend - tbegin)*All.Timebase_interval;
00044         hubble_a = (All.Omega0 / (All.Time * All.Time * All.Time)
00045                     + (1 - All.Omega0 - All.OmegaLambda) / (All.Time * All.Time) + All.OmegaLambda);
00046         hubble_a = All.Hubble * sqrt(hubble_a);
00047         dT = dloga/hubble_a;
00048 
00049         dV = dV/All.Time; /* Convert from internal velocity p = a^2 dx/dt to peculiar velocity v = a dx/dt*/
00050         dV -= All.Time*hubble_a*r; /* Substract Hubble flow */
00051 
00052         h = All.ForceSoftening[1]*All.Time;
00053       }
00054     else
00055       {
00056         dT = (tend-tbegin)*All.Timebase_interval;
00057         h = All.ForceSoftening[1];
00058       }
00059 
00060     prob = All.InteractionCrossSection*dV*dT*g_geo(r)/(h*h*h*All.UnitLength_in_cm*All.UnitLength_in_cm);
00061 
00062     return prob;
00063 
00064   }
00065 
00069 double g_geo(double r)
00070 {
00071   double  f, u;
00072   int i;
00073 
00074   u = r / 2.0 * GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH;
00075   i = (int) u;
00076   if (i >= GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH)
00077     i = GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH - 1;
00078 
00079   if (i <= 1)
00080     f = 0.992318  + (GeoFactorTable[0] - 0.992318)*u;
00081   else
00082     f = GeoFactorTable[i - 1] + (GeoFactorTable[i] - GeoFactorTable[i - 1]) * (u - i);
00083 
00084   return f;
00085 }

00091 void  calculate_interact_kick(FLOAT Vtarget[3], FLOAT Vno[3], double kick_target[3], double kick_no[3])
00092 {
00093   double dV,theta,phi,dvx,dvy,dvz;
00094 
00095   dvx = Vno[0]-Vtarget[0];
00096   dvy = Vno[1]-Vtarget[1];
00097   dvz = Vno[2]-Vtarget[2];
00098   dV = sqrt(dvx*dvx + dvy*dvy + dvz*dvz);
00099 
00100   theta = gsl_rng_uniform(random_generator)*M_PI;
00101   phi = gsl_rng_uniform(random_generator)*2.0*M_PI;
00102 
00103   kick_target[0] = (-Vtarget[0] + Vno[0] + dV*sin(theta)*cos(phi))/2.0;
00104   kick_no[0] = (Vtarget[0] - Vno[0] - dV*sin(theta)*cos(phi))/2.0;
00105 
00106   kick_target[1] = (-Vtarget[1] + Vno[1] + dV*sin(theta)*sin(phi))/2.0;
00107   kick_no[1] = (Vtarget[1] - Vno[1] - dV*sin(theta)*sin(phi))/2.0;
00108 
00109   kick_target[2] = (-Vtarget[2] + Vno[2] + dV*cos(theta))/2.0;
00110   kick_no[2] = (Vtarget[2] - Vno[2] - dV*cos(theta))/2.0;
00111 }

00117 void init_geofactor_table(void)
00118 {
00119   int i;
00120   double result, abserr,r;
00121   gsl_function F;
00122   gsl_integration_workspace *workspace;
00123   workspace = gsl_integration_workspace_alloc(GSLWORKSIZE);
00124 
00125   for(i = 0; i < GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00126   {
00127     r =  2.0/GEOFACTOR_TABLE_LENGTH * (i + 1);
00128     F.function = &geofactor_integ;
00129     F.params = &r;
00130     gsl_integration_qag(&F, 0.0, 1.0, 0, 1.0e-8, GSLWORKSIZE, GSL_INTEG_GAUSS41,workspace, &result, &abserr);
00131     GeoFactorTable[i] = 2*M_PI*result;
00132   }
00133   gsl_integration_workspace_free(workspace);
00134 }
00135 
00138 double geofactor_integ(double x, void * params)
00139 {
00140   double result, abserr,r;
00141   double newparams[2];
00142 
00143   r = *(double *) params;
00144   newparams[0] = r;
00145   newparams[1] = x;
00146 
00147   gsl_function F;
00148   gsl_integration_workspace *workspace;
00149   workspace = gsl_integration_workspace_alloc(GSLWORKSIZE);
00150 
00151   F.function = &geofactor_angle_integ;
00152   F.params = newparams;
00153 
00154   gsl_integration_qag(&F, -1.0, 1.0, 0, 1.0e-8, GSLWORKSIZE, GSL_INTEG_GAUSS41,workspace, &result, &abserr);
00155 
00156   return x*x*kernel(x)*result;
00157 }
00158 
00162 double geofactor_angle_integ(double u, void * params)
00163 {
00164   double x,r,f;
00165 
00166   r = *(double *) params;
00167   x = *(double *) (params + sizeof(double));
00168   f = sqrt(x*x + r*r + 2*x*r*u);
00169 
00170   return kernel(f);
00171 }
00172 
00175 double kernel(double u)
00176 {
00177   double w;
00178 
00179   if (u < 1.0)
00180     {
00181       if (u <= 0.5)
00182         {
00183           w = KERNEL_COEFF_1 + KERNEL_COEFF_2 * (u - 1) * u * u;
00184           return w;
00185         }
00186       else
00187         {
00188           w = KERNEL_COEFF_5 * (1.0 - u) * (1.0 - u) * (1.0 - u);
00189           return w;
00190         }
00191     }
00192   else
00193   {
00194     return 0.0;
00195   }
00196 }
